game.name: Clean Road
game.description:
The level of fun and thrill is going to reach to the ultimate level with the exploration of this brand new racing challenge! In this one of the best racing games for kids, you have to play the role of a rescuer to the private cars. Join Clean Road and get ready to rescue plenty of private cars using a snow truck that you have given in the game! Snow all over the ground and help the needy cars as fast as you can! Control the snow plow by touching and dragging! 

Don’t forget to avoid the obstacles when you are on your mission in this free online truck game! There are many people who are also waiting for your helping hands to get out of their homes where they have got stuck. Play wisely to collect considerable points that you can also use to upgrade your vehicle! Don’t avoid upgrading your vehicles cine the mightiest snow storm is awaiting you further! It will be pretty challenging to rescue the trapped cars by driving a truck and clearing the path. 

You will see snow everywhere on the road and many vehicles of your known people have been trapped there. Luckily, you have a truck that is much capable of rescuing all such trapped cars. Drive a large snow plow to complete the mission in each level while avoid being collided with some tractors! If this happens, you will not be able to move your truck and lose your game.  Check out more top truck games on our website for free! The controls of our all cool HTML5 games are very simple and easy.
